p: In the CD-MOF, the γ-CD molecules were parallelly face-to-face in couples. The polar hydroxyl and carboxyl groups of SCU formed strong hydrogen bonds with the γ-CD in CD-MOF ( Fig. 4). As a result, the docking free energy of the first molecule of SCU reached −9.3 kcal/mol, while the docking free energy of the second molecule was −9.2 kcal/mol. The simulation showed that two SCU molecules hardly interacted with each other, which almost completely symmetrically distributed in the bi-cyclodextrin pair.
